title: About the NT region
body: Being apart of CDU, I highly doubt that there will be more than 4 teams participating in the region. If there are 4 or fewer teams participating, does that mean we automatically qualify for the top 4 spots and play on the 15/16th rather than the 1st/2nd of August?

replies.body: We will decide on that after all the teams are locked in and we release brackets.
